author: Creed Bratton
quote: And it's possible a man slipped in. There would be no way of knowing.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: And the reward for its capture? All the riches in Scotland. So I have one question. Why are you here?

author: Creed Bratton
quote: Nobody steals from Creed Bratton and gets away with it. The last person to do this disappeared. His name? Creed Bratton.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: My tombstone's already been made, thank you.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: Be cool Michael. I saw this guy kill a bunch of people.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: He's been trashing us relentlessly on Twitter. It's funny stuff, but mean.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: When Pam gets Michael's new chair, I get Pam's old chair. Then I'll have two chairs. Only one to go.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: Let's keep this on the QT okay? I want you to be a dead mama jama.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: A beautiful morning at Dunder Mifflin, or like a like to call it, Great Bratton.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: I've done a lot more for a lot less.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: Just pretend like we're talking until the cops leave.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: The only difference between me and a homeless man is this job. I will do whatever it takes to survive.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: You know, a human can go on living for several hours after being decapitated.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: Andrea is the office bitch. You'll get used to her.

author: Creed Bratton
quote: I was in an iron lung when I was a teenager.
